cards.name: Absolute Grace
cards.text: All creatures have protection from black.
cards.flavor: In pursuit of Urza, the Phyrexians sent countless foul legions into Serra's realm. Though beaten back, they left it tainted with uncleansable evil.

cards.name: Absolute Law
cards.text: All creatures have protection from red.
cards.flavor: The strength of law is unwavering. It is an iron bar in a world of water.

cards.name: Angelic Chorus
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.
cards.flavor: The very young and the very old know best the song the angels sing.

cards.name: Angelic Page
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: If only every message were as perfect as its bearers.

cards.name: Brilliant Halo
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
When Brilliant Halo is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Brilliant Halo to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Catastrophe
cards.text: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

cards.name: Clear
cards.text:
Destroy target enchantment.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Congregate
cards.text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
-Song of All, canto 642

cards.name: Defensive Formation
cards.text: Rather than the attacking player, you assign the combat damage of each creature attacking you. You can divide that creature's combat damage as you choose among any of the creatures blocking it.
cards.flavor:
"Your enemies will pound upon the door of your defenses, but only you shall have the key, and it is the key of life."
-Song of All, canto 873

cards.name: Disciple of Grace
cards.text:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Beauty is beyond law.

cards.name: Disciple of Law
cards.text:
Protection from red
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: A religious order for religious order.

cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"Let Phyrexia breed evil in the darkness; my holy light will reveal its taint."
-Serra

cards.name: Elite Archers
cards.text: {T}: Elite Archers deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: Arrows fletched with the feathers of angels seldom miss their mark.

cards.name: Faith Healer
cards.text: Sacrifice an enchantment: You gain life equal to the sacrificed enchantment's mana value.
cards.flavor: The power of faith is quiet. It is the leaf unmoved by the hurricane.

cards.name: Glorious Anthem
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Once heard, the battle song of an angel becomes part of the listener forever.

cards.name: Healing Salve
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Xantcha is recovering. The medicine is slow, but my magic would have killed her."
-Serra, to Urza

cards.name: Herald of Serra
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Echo {2}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

cards.name: Humble
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1.
cards.flavor:
"It is not your place to rule, Radiant. It may not even be mine."
-Serra

cards.name: Intrepid Hero
cards.text: {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: "We each have our own strengths, Radiant," Serra said with a sly smile. "If all of my people were like this one, who would carry your scrolls?"

cards.name: Monk Idealist
cards.text: When Monk Idealist enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Belief is the strongest mortar."

cards.name: Monk Realist
cards.text: When Monk Realist enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor: "We plant the seeds of doubt to harvest the crop of wisdom."

cards.name: Opal Acrolith
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Acrolith is an enchantment, Opal Acrolith becomes a 2/4 Soldier creature.
{0}: Opal Acrolith becomes an enchantment.

cards.name: Opal Archangel
cards.text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Archangel is an enchantment, Opal Archangel becomes a 5/5 Angel creature with flying and vigilance.

cards.name: Opal Caryatid
cards.text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Caryatid is an enchantment, Opal Caryatid becomes a 2/2 Soldier creature.

cards.name: Opal Gargoyle
cards.text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Gargoyle is an enchantment, Opal Gargoyle becomes a 2/2 Gargoyle creature with flying.

foreignPrintings.name: オパールのガーゴイル

cards.name: Opal Titan
cards.text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Titan is an enchantment, Opal Titan becomes a 4/4 Giant creature with protection from each of that spell's colors.

cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor:
"Fight? I cannot. I do not care if I live or die, so long as I can rest."
-Urza, to Serra

cards.name: Pariah
cards.text:
Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
cards.flavor: "It is not sad," Radiant chided the lesser angel. "It is right. Every society must have its outcasts."

cards.name: Path of Peace
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
cards.flavor:
"When the sword becomes a burden, let the warrior lay it aside that another with a truer heart might take it up."
-Radiant, archangel

cards.name: Pegasus Charger
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor:
"The clouds came alive and dove to the earth! Hooves flashed among the dark army, who fled before the spectacle of fury."
-Song of All, canto 211

cards.name: Planar Birth
cards.text: Return all basic land cards from all graveyards to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control.
cards.flavor:
"From womb of nothingness sprang this place of beauty, purity, and hope realized."
-Song of All, canto 3

cards.name: Presence of the Master
cards.text: Whenever a player casts an enchantment spell, counter it.
cards.flavor:
Peace to all. Peace be all.
-Great Hall floor inscription

cards.name: Redeem
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to up to two target creatures.
cards.flavor:
"That they are saved from death is immaterial. What is important is that they know the source of their benefaction."
-Radiant, archangel

cards.name: Remembrance
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may search your library for a card with the same name as that creature, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Rune of Protection: Artifacts
cards.text:
{W}: The next time an artifact source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Rune of Protection: Black
cards.text:
{W}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Rune of Protection: Blue
cards.text:
{W}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Rune of Protection: Green
cards.text:
{W}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Rune of Protection: Lands
cards.text:
{W}: The next time a land source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Rune of Protection: Red
cards.text:
{W}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Rune of Protection: White
cards.text:
{W}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Sanctum Custodian
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
cards.flavor: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.

cards.name: Sanctum Guardian
cards.text: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage.
cards.flavor: "Protect our mother in her womb."

cards.name: Seasoned Marshal
cards.text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
cards.flavor: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

cards.name: Serra Avatar
cards.text:
Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Serra Zealot
cards.text: First strike
cards.flavor:
"The humans are useful in their way, but they must be commanded as the builder commands the stone. Be soft with them, and they will become soft."
-Radiant, archangel

cards.name: Serra's Embrace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.
cards.flavor:
"Lifted beyond herself, for that battle Brindri was an angel of light and fury."
-Song of All, canto 524

cards.name: Serra's Hymn
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Serra's Hymn.
Sacrifice Serra's Hymn: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose, where X is the number of verse counters on Serra's Hymn.

cards.name: Serra's Liturgy
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Serra's Liturgy.
{W}, Sacrifice Serra's Liturgy: Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments, where X is the number of verse counters on Serra's Liturgy.

cards.name: Shimmering Barrier
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Silent Attendant
cards.text: {T}: You gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: "The answer to life should never be death; it should always be more life, wrapped tight around us like precious silks."

cards.name: Songstitcher
cards.text: {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.
cards.flavor: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.

cards.name: Soul Sculptor
cards.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Target creature becomes an enchantment and loses all abilities until a player casts a creature spell.
cards.flavor: Does the stone mimic life, or did it once live?

cards.name: Voice of Grace
cards.text: Flying, protection from black
cards.flavor:
"Opposite Law is Grace, and Grace must be preserved. If the strands of Grace are unraveled, its design will be lost, and the people with it."
-Song of All, canto 167

cards.name: Voice of Law
cards.text: Flying, protection from red
cards.flavor:
"Life's balance is as a star: on one point is Law, and Law must be upheld. If the knots of order are loosened, chaos will spill through."
-Song of All, canto 167

cards.name: Waylay
cards.text: Create three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens. Exile them at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
cards.flavor: "You reek of corruption," spat the knight. "Why are you even here?"

cards.name: Worship
cards.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
cards.flavor:
"Believe in the ideal, not the idol."
-Serra

cards.name: Academy Researchers
cards.text: When Academy Researchers enters the battlefield, you may put an Aura card from your hand onto the battlefield attached to Academy Researchers.

cards.name: Annul
cards.text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
cards.flavor: The most effective way to destroy a spell is to ensure it was never cast in the first place.

cards.name: Arcane Laboratory
cards.text: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
cards.flavor: It soon became obvious that some experiments were best overseen by fireproof teachers.

cards.name: Attunement
cards.text: Return Attunement to its owner's hand: Draw three cards, then discard four cards.
cards.flavor:
"The solution can hide for only so long."
-Urza

cards.name: Back to Basics
cards.text: Nonbasic lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
cards.flavor:
"A ruler wears a crown while the rest of us wear hats, but which would you rather have when it's raining?"
-Barrin, Principia

cards.name: Barrin, Master Wizard
cards.text: {2}, Sacrifice a permanent: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Knowledge is no more expensive than ignorance, and at least as satisfying."
-Barrin, master wizard

cards.name: Catalog
cards.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
cards.flavor:
"Without order comes errors, and errors kill on Tolaria."
-Barrin, master wizard

cards.name: Cloak of Mists
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
cards.flavor:
"All we could lose, we did. All we could keep, we do. And both are shrouded by mists."
-Barrin, master wizard

cards.name: Confiscate
cards.text:
Enchant permanent
You control enchanted permanent.
cards.flavor:
"I don't understand why he works so hard on a device to duplicate a sound so easily made with hand and armpit."
-Barrin, progress report

cards.name: Coral Merfolk
cards.flavor: It is not unusual for a single family of coral merfolk to spend centuries carefully guiding the growth of the reefs where they make their home.

cards.name: Curfew
cards.text: Each player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: ". . . But I'm not tired!"

cards.name: Disruptive Student
cards.text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
cards.flavor:
"Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."
-Barrin, progress report

cards.name: Douse
cards.text: {1}{U}: Counter target red spell.
cards.flavor: The academy's libraries were protected by fire-prevention spells. Even after the disaster, the books were intact-though forever sealed in time.

cards.name: Drifting Djinn
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Drifting Djinn unless you pay {1}{U}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Enchantment Alteration
cards.text: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

cards.name: Energy Field
cards.text:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you by sources you don't control.
When a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, sacrifice Energy Field.

foreignPrintings.name: エネルギー・フィールド

cards.name: Exhaustion
cards.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during their next untap step.
cards.flavor: The mage felt as though he'd been in the stasis suit for days. Upon his return, he found it was months.

cards.name: Fog Bank
cards.text:
Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.

cards.name: Gilded Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Gilded Drake enters the battlefield, exchange control of Gilded Drake and up to one target creature an opponent controls. If you don't or can't make an exchange, sacrifice Gilded Drake. This ability still resolves if its target becomes illegal.
cards.flavor: Buyer beware.

cards.name: Great Whale
cards.text: When Great Whale enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands.
cards.flavor:
"As a great whale dies, it flips onto its back. And so an island is born."
-Mariners' legend

cards.name: Hermetic Study
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
cards.flavor:
"Books can be replaced; a prize student cannot. Be patient."
-Urza, to Barrin

cards.name: Hibernation
cards.text: Return all green permanents to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor: On its way to the cave, the armadillo brushed by a sapling. It awoke to find a full-grown tree blocking its path.

cards.name: Horseshoe Crab
cards.text: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.
cards.flavor: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

cards.name: Imaginary Pet
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have a card in hand, return Imaginary Pet to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "It followed me home. Can I keep it?"

cards.name: Launch
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
When Launch is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Launch to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Lilting Refrain
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Lilting Refrain.
Sacrifice Lilting Refrain: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of verse counters on Lilting Refrain.

cards.name: Lingering Mirage
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is an Island.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Birds frozen in flight. Sea turned to glass. Tolaria hidden in a mirror.

cards.name: Morphling
cards.text:
{U}: Untap Morphling.
{U}: Morphling gains flying until end of turn.
{U}: Morphling gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{1}: Morphling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Morphling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Pendrell Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: The mages of Tolaria found strange ways to spend their free time. Occasionally they had contests to see whose kite was eaten last.

foreignPrintings.name: ペンドレルのドレイク

cards.name: Pendrell Flux
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay its mana cost."
cards.flavor: Devoured by the mists, Tolaria was stuck in time, trapped between two eternal heartbeats.

cards.name: Peregrine Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.
cards.flavor: That the Tolarian mists parted for the drakes was warning enough to stay away.

cards.name: Power Sink
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

cards.name: Power Taint
cards.text:
Enchant enchantment
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player loses 2 life unless they pay {2}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Recantation
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Recantation.
{U}, Sacrifice Recantation: Return up to X target permanents to their owners' hands, where X is the number of verse counters on Recantation.

cards.name: Rescind
cards.text:
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Rewind
cards.text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
cards.flavor:
"Time flows like a river. In Tolaria we practice the art of building dams."
-Barrin, master wizard

cards.name: Sandbar Merfolk
cards.text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: You are not prey until a predator knows of your existence.

foreignPrintings.name: Tritón de los bancos de arena

cards.name: Sandbar Serpent
cards.text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Treacherous and unpredictable currents around Tolaria earned the nickname "serpent wakes."

foreignPrintings.name: Serpiente de los bancos de arena
Grand serpent des bancs de sable

cards.name: Show and Tell
cards.text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."

cards.name: Somnophore
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Somnophore deals damage to a player, tap target creature that player controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Somnophore remains on the battlefield.

cards.name: Spire Owl
cards.text:
Flying
When Spire Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

cards.name: Stern Proctor
cards.text: When Stern Proctor enters the battlefield, return target artifact or enchantment to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"I preferred the harsh tutors-they made mischief all the more fun."
-Teferi, third-level student

cards.name: Stroke of Genius
cards.text: Target player draws X cards.
cards.flavor: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.

cards.name: Sunder
cards.text: Return all lands to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor: The flow of time was disrupted; like a flooding river it rose from its banks. Tolaria was drowned in an instant that stretched toward infinity.

cards.name: Telepathy
cards.text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
cards.flavor:
"The most disappointing thing about learning telepathy is finding out how boring people really are."
-Teferi, fourth-level student

cards.name: Time Spiral
cards.text: Exile Time Spiral. Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. You untap up to six lands.

cards.name: Tolarian Winds
cards.text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.
cards.flavor: Afterward, Tolaria's winds were like the whispers of lost wizards, calling for life.

cards.name: Turnabout
cards.text: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.
cards.flavor: The best cure for a big ego is a little failure.

cards.name: Veil of Birds
cards.text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veil of Birds is an enchantment, Veil of Birds becomes a 1/1 Bird creature with flying.
cards.flavor: When wind marries sky, even the bride's veil sings her praises.

cards.name: Veiled Apparition
cards.text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Apparition is an enchantment, Veiled Apparition becomes a 3/3 Illusion creature with flying and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Veiled Apparition unless you pay {1}{U}."

cards.name: Veiled Crocodile
cards.text: When a player has no cards in hand, if Veiled Crocodile is an enchantment, Veiled Crocodile becomes a 4/4 Crocodile creature.
cards.flavor: Some roads are paved with bad intentions.

cards.name: Veiled Sentry
cards.text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Sentry is an enchantment, Veiled Sentry becomes an Illusion creature with power and toughness each equal to that spell's mana value.

cards.name: Veiled Serpent
cards.text:
When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Serpent is an enchantment, Veiled Serpent becomes a 4/4 Serpent creature with "This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island."
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Windfall
cards.text: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
cards.flavor:
"To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."
-Barrin, master wizard

cards.name: Wizard Mentor
cards.text: {T}: Return Wizard Mentor and target creature you control to their owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Although some of the students quickly grasped the concept, the others could summon only blackboards.

cards.name: Zephid
cards.text:
Flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: Once you've seen one, you'll understand why spells won't go near them.

cards.name: Zephid's Embrace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: Spells will shun you, as will everyone else.

cards.name: Abyssal Horror
cards.text:
Flying
When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.
cards.flavor: It has no face of its own-it wears that of its latest victim.

cards.name: Befoul
cards.text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"The land putrefied at its touch, turned into an oily bile in seconds."
-Radiant, archangel

cards.name: Bereavement
cards.text: Whenever a green creature dies, its controller discards a card.
cards.flavor:
"Grief is as useless as love."
-Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

cards.name: Blood Vassal
cards.text: Sacrifice Blood Vassal: Add {B}{B}.
cards.flavor:
"They are bred to suffer and born to die. Much like humans."
-Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

cards.name: Bog Raiders
cards.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
cards.flavor:
"Let weak feed on weak, that we may divine the nature of strength."
-Phyrexian Scriptures

cards.name: Breach
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

cards.name: Cackling Fiend
cards.text: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

cards.name: Carrion Beetles
cards.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
cards.flavor: It's all fun and games until someone loses an eye.

cards.name: Contamination
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Contamination unless you sacrifice a creature.
If a land is tapped for mana, it produces {B} instead of any other type and amount.

cards.name: Corrupt
cards.text: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
cards.flavor: Yawgmoth brushed Urza's mind, and Urza's world convulsed.

cards.name: Crazed Skirge
cards.text: Flying, haste
cards.flavor: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.

cards.name: Dark Hatchling
cards.text:
Flying
When Dark Hatchling enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
cards.flavor:
"From void evolved Phyrexia. Great Yawgmoth, Father of Machines, saw its perfection. Thus The Grand Evolution began."
-Phyrexian Scriptures

cards.name: Darkest Hour
cards.text: All creatures are black.
cards.flavor:
"Yawgmoth spent eons wrapping Phyrexians in human skin. They are the sleeper agents, and they are everywhere."
-Xantcha, to Urza

cards.name: Elvish Herder
cards.text: {G}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Before Urza and Mishra came to Argoth, the herders prevented their creatures from stampeding. During the war, they encouraged it.

cards.name: Elvish Lyrist
cards.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor: Bring the spear of ancient briar; Bring the torch to light the pyre. Bring the one who trod our ground; Bring the spade to dig his mound.

cards.name: Endless Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Endless Wurm unless you sacrifice an enchantment.
cards.flavor: Ages ago, a party of elves took cover to let one pass. They're still waiting.

cards.name: Exploration
cards.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
cards.flavor: The first explorers found Argoth a storehouse of natural wealth-towering forests grown over rich veins of ore.

cards.name: Fecundity
cards.text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.
cards.flavor: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

cards.name: Fertile Ground
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil-almost.

cards.name: Fortitude
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate enchanted creature.
When Fortitude is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Fortitude to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Gaea's Bounty
cards.text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: The forest grew back so quickly that lumbering machines were suspended in the treetops.

cards.name: Gaea's Embrace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: The forest rose to the battle, not to save the people but to save itself.

cards.name: Gorilla Warrior
cards.flavor: The gorilla beat its chest and threw great handfuls of leaves into the air. It howled challenge and showed its teeth. The mechanical soldier, not understanding, simply killed it.

cards.name: Greater Good
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.
cards.flavor:
"We have more sprouts than they have hands."
-Gamelen, Citanul elder

cards.name: Greener Pastures
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls more lands than each other player, the player creates a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

cards.name: Hawkeater Moth
cards.text:
Flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: Each day at dusk the birds above the canopy grow silent.

cards.name: Hidden Ancients
cards.text: When an opponent casts an enchantment spell, if Hidden Ancients is an enchantment, Hidden Ancients becomes a 5/5 Treefolk creature.
cards.flavor: The only alert the invaders had was the rustling of leaves on a day without wind.

cards.name: Hidden Guerrillas
cards.text: When an opponent casts an artifact spell, if Hidden Guerrillas is an enchantment, Hidden Guerrillas becomes a 5/3 Soldier creature with trample.

cards.name: Hidden Herd
cards.text: When an opponent plays a nonbasic land, if Hidden Herd is an enchantment, Hidden Herd becomes a 3/3 Beast creature.

cards.name: Hidden Predators
cards.text: When an opponent controls a creature with power 4 or greater, if Hidden Predators is an enchantment, Hidden Predators becomes a 4/4 Beast creature.

cards.name: Hidden Spider
cards.text: When an opponent casts a creature spell with flying, if Hidden Spider is an enchantment, Hidden Spider becomes a 3/5 Spider creature with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: It wants only to dress you in silk.

cards.name: Hidden Stag
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent plays a land, if Hidden Stag is an enchantment, Hidden Stag becomes a 3/2 Elk Beast creature.
Whenever you play a land, if Hidden Stag is a creature, Hidden Stag becomes an enchantment.

cards.name: Hush
cards.text:
Destroy all enchantments.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Lull
cards.text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Midsummer Revel
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Midsummer Revel.
{G}, Sacrifice Midsummer Revel: Create X 3/3 green Beast creature tokens, where X is the number of verse counters on Midsummer Revel.

cards.name: Pouncing Jaguar
cards.text: Echo {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
cards.flavor: One pounce, she's hungry-you die quickly. Two, she's teaching her cubs-you're in for a long day.

cards.name: Priest of Titania
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} for each Elf on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Titania rewards all those who honor the forest by making them a living part of it.

cards.name: Rejuvenate
cards.text:
You gain 6 life.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Retaliation
cards.text: Creatures you control have "Whenever this creature becomes blocked by a creature, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
cards.flavor: A foul, metallic stench clogged Urza's senses. It was then he knew his brother was no more.

cards.name: Sporogenesis
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fungus counter on target nontoken creature.
Whenever a creature with a fungus counter on it dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each fungus counter on that creature.
When Sporogenesis leaves the battlefield, remove all fungus counters from all creatures.

cards.name: Spreading Algae
cards.text:
Enchant Swamp
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.
When Spreading Algae is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spreading Algae to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Symbiosis
cards.text: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

cards.name: Titania's Boon
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor: When the winds rock the trees, listen for voices in the creaking of the trunks. If you hear your name, you are one of the Goddess's chosen.

cards.name: Titania's Chosen
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Titania's Chosen.
cards.flavor:
"What do a hero and an arrow have in common? In times of war are many more made."
-Elvish riddle

foreignPrintings.name: ティタニアの選ばれしもの

cards.name: Treefolk Seedlings
cards.text: Treefolk Seedlings's toughness is equal to the number of Forests you control.
cards.flavor: The year that the brothers landed on Argoth, the trees produced five times as many seeds as normal.

foreignPrintings.name: ツリーフォークの若木

cards.name: Treetop Rangers
cards.text: Treetop Rangers can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
cards.flavor:
"If you can't catch them, cut the trees down from beneath them. Force them to fight on our terms."
-Mishra

cards.name: Venomous Fangs
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature.
cards.flavor: All the pain of the shattered forest contained in a single drop.

cards.name: Vernal Bloom
cards.text: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
cards.flavor: Many cultures have legends of a lush, hidden paradise. The elves of Argoth had no need of such stories.

cards.name: War Dance
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on War Dance.
Sacrifice War Dance: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of verse counters on War Dance.

cards.name: Whirlwind
cards.text: Destroy all creatures with flying.
cards.flavor: Urza tried to rule the air, but Gaea taught him that she controlled all the elements.

cards.name: Wild Dogs
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of Wild Dogs.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Winding Wurm
cards.text: Echo {4}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
cards.flavor: Entire trees were stripped of their bark and branches by the wurm's writhing path.

cards.name: Barrin's Codex
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Barrin's Codex.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Barrin's Codex: Draw X cards, where X is the number of page counters on Barrin's Codex.

cards.name: Cathodion
cards.text: When Cathodion dies, add {C}{C}{C}.
cards.flavor: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

cards.name: Chimeric Staff
cards.text: {X}: Chimeric Staff becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A snake in the grasp.

cards.name: Citanul Flute
cards.text: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

foreignPrintings.name: シタヌールのフルート

cards.name: Claws of Gix
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice a permanent: You gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: When the Brotherhood of Gix dug out the cave of Koilos they found their master's severed hand. They enshrined it, hoping that one day it would point the way to Phyrexia.

cards.name: Copper Gnomes
cards.text: {4}, Sacrifice Copper Gnomes: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Start with eleven gnomes and a room of parts, and come morning you'll have ten and a monster the likes of which you've never seen.

cards.name: Crystal Chimes
cards.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Crystal Chimes: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: As Serra was to learn, the peace and sanctity of her realm were as fragile as glass.

cards.name: Dragon Blood
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor: Fire in the blood, fire in the belly.

cards.name: Endoskeleton
cards.text:
You may choose not to untap Endoskeleton during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+3 for as long as Endoskeleton remains tapped.

cards.name: Fluctuator
cards.text: Cycling abilities you activate cost up to {2} less to activate.
cards.flavor: Fiko summoned only atogs for three straight sessions. The tutor couldn't decide whether to punish his failure or praise his consistency.

cards.name: Grafted Skullcap
cards.text:
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.
cards.flavor:
"Let go your mind. Mine is fitter."
-Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

cards.name: Hopping Automaton
cards.text: {0}: Hopping Automaton gets -1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Designed to carry equipment across rivers, the hopping automaton was soon pressed into service in the infantry.

foreignPrintings.name: ピョンピョン自動人形

cards.name: Karn, Silver Golem
cards.text:
Whenever Karn, Silver Golem blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -4/+4 until end of turn.
{1}: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value until end of turn.

cards.name: Lifeline
cards.text: Whenever a creature dies, if another creature is on the battlefield, return the first card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Lotus Blossom
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a petal counter on Lotus Blossom.
{T}, Sacrifice Lotus Blossom: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of petal counters on Lotus Blossom.

cards.name: Metrognome
cards.text:
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Metrognome, create four 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens.
{4}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.

cards.name: Mishra's Helix
cards.text: {X}, {T}: Tap X target lands.
cards.flavor: The helix was the finest example of Mishra's campaign strategy: if he couldn't have Argoth, no one could.

cards.name: Mobile Fort
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Mobile Fort gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate only once each turn.

cards.name: Noetic Scales
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, return to its owner's hand each creature that player controls with power greater than the number of cards in their hand.

cards.name: Phyrexian Colossus
cards.text:
Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus.
Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

foreignPrintings.name: ファイレクシアの巨像

cards.name: Phyrexian Processor
cards.text:
As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.
{4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

foreignPrintings.name: ファイレクシアの処理装置

cards.name: Pit Trap
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pit Trap: Destroy target attacking creature without flying. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: Yotian soldiers were designed to fight, not watch their feet.

cards.name: Purging Scythe
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Purging Scythe deals 2 damage to the creature with the least toughness. If two or more creatures are tied for least toughness, you choose one of them.

cards.name: Smokestack
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a soot counter on Smokestack.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a permanent for each soot counter on Smokestack.

cards.name: Temporal Aperture
cards.text: {5}, {T}: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. Until end of turn, for as long as that card remains on top of your library, play with the top card of your library revealed and you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)

cards.name: Thran Turbine
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may add {C}{C}. You can't spend this mana to cast spells.
cards.flavor: When Urza asked the viashino what it did, they answered: "It hums."

cards.name: Umbilicus
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand unless they pay 2 life.
cards.flavor: It was the explorers' only tether to reality.

cards.name: Urza's Armor
cards.text: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
cards.flavor:
"Tawnos's blueprints were critical to the creation of my armor. As he once sealed himself in steel, I sealed myself in a walking crypt."
-Urza

cards.name: Voltaic Key
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
cards.flavor: The key did not work on a single lock, yet it opened many doors.

cards.name: Wall of Junk
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Junk blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
cards.flavor: Urza saw the wall and realized that even if he tore every Phyrexian to pieces, they would still resist him.

cards.name: Whetstone
cards.text: {3}: Each player mills two cards.
cards.flavor:
To hone swords and dull minds.
-Whetstone inscription

cards.name: Wirecat
cards.text: Wirecat can't attack or block if an enchantment is on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Its purr is the sound of iron filings sliding down satin.

cards.name: Worn Powerstone
cards.text:
Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

foreignPrintings.name: 摩滅したパワーストーン

cards.name: Blasted Landscape
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Drifting Meadow
cards.text:
Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Gaea's Cradle
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"Here sprouted the first seedling of Argoth. Here the last tree will fall."
-Gamelen, Citanul elder

cards.name: Phyrexian Tower
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Add {B}{B}.
cards.flavor: Living metal encasing dying flesh.

cards.name: Polluted Mire
cards.text:
Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Remote Isle
cards.text:
Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Serra's Sanctum
cards.text: {T}: Add {W} for each enchantment you control.
cards.flavor: A fragile cocoon of dreaming will.

cards.name: Shivan Gorge
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}{R}, {T}: Shivan Gorge deals 1 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor: Both forge and pyre.

cards.name: Slippery Karst
cards.text:
Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Smoldering Crater
cards.text:
Smoldering Crater enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Thran Quarry
cards.text:
At the beginning of the end step, if you control no creatures, sacrifice Thran Quarry.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.name: Tolarian Academy
cards.text: {T}: Add {U} for each artifact you control.
cards.flavor: The academy worked with time-until time ran out.

foreignPrintings.name: トレイリアのアカデミー
